# 0 : empty
# 1 : wall

# p : player1
# P : player2

# w : water
# l : lava

# W : water gem
# L : lava gem
# d : lava door
# D : water door

# g : gun shooting right
# G : gun shooting left
# f : gun shooting fire right
# F : gun shooting fire left
# b : gun shooting (blue) water right
# B : gun shooting (Blue) water left
